name: Green Bot
description:
Green Bot is a top-down action game where you are a robot who wants to save the Earth from global warming.

Your mission is to destroy factories before it's too late!

This game was made for Mini Jam #124, which main theme was Warmth with the limitation "your score serves a purpose".

Play on fullscreen for a better experience.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space to stomp on enemy

Special thanks to Oscar Medina, jaoc1811 and CalitoRivero.

Credits:

Robot on a Mission by Mafer Vera
